Sentencas: Multiferroic perovskite/spinel hybrid nanocomposites from lanthanum (La) and chromium (Cr) co-doped bismuth ferrite (BiFeO3); (Bi0.8La0.2Fe0.92Cr0.08O3) (BLFCO) as a multiferroic single phase matrix and a renowned hard ferrite spinel nanocrystalline of cobalt ferrite (CoFe2O4) (CFO) were prepared, investigated and their observed promising magnetic and dielectric properties were presented in this manuscript.
Titulo: Constructive coupling between BiFeO3 and CoFe2O4; promising magnetic and dielectric properties

Sentencas: The formation of ((1-y) Bi0.8La0.2Fe0.92Cr0.8O3+(y) CoFe2O4, y = 0.0. 0.5, 0.6, 0.7, 0.8, and 1.0) nanocomposites with two different constituent phases was checked and assured by XRD.
Titulo: Constructive coupling between BiFeO3 and CoFe2O4; promising magnetic and dielectric properties

Sentencas: Further, FTIR was used for confirming the coexistence of two separate constituent phases within the investigated nanocomposite.
Titulo: Constructive coupling between BiFeO3 and CoFe2O4; promising magnetic and dielectric properties

Sentencas: HRTEM and FESEM were used for morphological and particle size determination.
Titulo: Constructive coupling between BiFeO3 and CoFe2O4; promising magnetic and dielectric properties

Sentencas: The coupling between the magnetic properties of the two parent phases was constructive and manifest enhancement in the magnetization.
Titulo: Constructive coupling between BiFeO3 and CoFe2O4; promising magnetic and dielectric properties

Sentencas: The composite dielectric properties introduced an enhancement manner; comparing with the dielectric properties of each individual phase of the composite.
Titulo: Constructive coupling between BiFeO3 and CoFe2O4; promising magnetic and dielectric properties

Sentencas: Also, the coupling in the dielectric properties as the result of composite structure procured to a growth in the dielectric properties comparing with the dielectric properties of each own phase of the composite.
Titulo: Constructive coupling between BiFeO3 and CoFe2O4; promising magnetic and dielectric properties

Sentencas: The composite at y = 0.5, showed maximum and optimum coupling results appearing in the enhancement in magnetic properties were around 3 times more than that of single phase of BLFCO, whereas the dielectric parameters increased around 5 folds more that of BLFCO.
Titulo: Constructive coupling between BiFeO3 and CoFe2O4; promising magnetic and dielectric properties

Sentencas: The obtained results of the composite between BLFCO and CFO nominate this composite for potential and promising applications such as solar cell perovskite, efficient room temperature real time gamma-radiation dosimetry, and solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Constructive coupling between BiFeO3 and CoFe2O4; promising magnetic and dielectric properties
